name: Prana Dooley Long Sleeve - Men's
description:
Not your average plaid. Crafted from a hardy, yarn-dyed corduroy, the Dooley has a comfortable heft.Organic cotton Corduroy wears well and has a satisfying weight to warmth ratio.Double button-up chest pockets keep small essentials on deck.Standard fit wears just like you want it to.
